title: How We Got Here #2: Postwar Era (Psychic Trauma of World War 2, Propaganda, Civil Rights, Cold War)
description:
So let's begin to unravel the thread of how we got here. Let's start at World War 2 and continue on from there. If you have any questions about this epoch feel free to ask. And if you have any contributions to the discussion by all means please do so.

Oh! And here is my companion essay to this introduction over at The Anadromous Life. 
https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/2019/05/11/announcing-the-anadromist/
I could really use some support out here beyond the walls in Tbilisi Georgia. Maybe consider some small monthly contribution through PayPal. 
Use this PayPal link to help out. https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G9LDYMSPZ5RGG
My other YouTube channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero
The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas: https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 
The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts. 
https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 
And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. 
https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private with too many friends. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 
Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 
Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. Swim against the stream my friends. 
From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!)
Byrne
